subject: ToolCallCard expand is not keyboard accessible
description: ToolCallCard uses a clickable CardHeader div without button semantics, so it cannot be focused or toggled via keyboard and has no aria-expanded state. Convert the header to a <button> or add role="button", tabIndex=0, key handlers, and aria-expanded. File: packages/web/src/components/chat/ToolCallCard.tsx:47-63.
